abstract: Harold Holzer, Lincoln scholar and former government official who recently retired as senior vice president for public affairs at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, will become next director of Roosevelt House Public Policy Institute at Hunter College.
lead_paragraph: Harold Holzer, a Lincoln scholar and former government official who recently retired from the museum, will take over the Roosevelt House Public Policy Institute at Hunter College.

headline.main: Former Met Museum Official to Lead Roosevelt House
headline.print_headline: A Lincoln Scholar Finds a New Home: Roosevelt’s

snippet: Harold Holzer, a Lincoln scholar and former government official who recently retired from the museum, will take over the Roosevelt House Public Policy Institute at Hunter College.
